title: Take Your Time
alternative_title: Teiku Yuaa Taimu ; テイク ユアー タイム ; 慢慢來的戀情
status: Teiku Yuaa Taimu ; テイク ユアー タイム ; 慢慢來的戀情
description:
Description :
        Shijima, a web designer, was one day, suddenly confessed to by his handsome and younger programmer colleague, Takitou. Shijima believes that Takitou is just misunderstanding his feelings for something romantic and in order to help him figure it out, Shijima suggested that they try dating each other for a while.

After going on dates and even getting looked after when he was ill, and despite them only trying out this dating thing, Shijima is finding himself geting more and more attracted to Takitou...

This is a slow story about the first love of a handsome and expressionless guy and a helpful older guy.
